CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this area chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Human Resources relative to Management Team?
SRP.A: Human Resources is {below} Management Team in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total absenteeism rate?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Engineering Department}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total absenteeism rate?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Sales Team}.

VE.Q: What is Management Team's Absenteeism Rate in 1992?
VE.A: Management Team's absenteeism rate in 1992 is {3.71} %.

VE.Q: What is Research & Development's Absenteeism Rate in 1991?
VE.A: Research & Development's absenteeism rate in 1991 is {3.98} %.

VE.Q: What is Management Team's Absenteeism Rate in 1996?
VE.A: Management Team's absenteeism rate in 1996 is {2.71} %.

VE.Q: What are the absenteeism rate of Management Team, Engineering Department, and Administrative Support in 1992?
VE.A: Management Team's absenteeism rate is {3.71} %, Engineering Department's absenteeism rate is {4.37} %, Administrative Support's absenteeism rate is {4.36} %.

EVJ.Q: What is the global minimum Absenteeism Rate in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global minimum absenteeism rate is {2.39} %.

EVJ.Q: What is the global maximum Absenteeism Rate in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global maximum absenteeism rate is {6.40} %.

EVJ.Q: What is the highest Absenteeism Rate level recorded for Administrative Support?
What is the lowest Absenteeism Rate level recorded for Administrative Support?
EVJ.A: Administrative Support's lowest recorded level is approximately {3.98} % in {1991}.

SC.Q: What is the average total Absenteeism Rate?
SC.A: The average total absenteeism rate is {24.59} %.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Absenteeism Rate exceed 24.94 %? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
Which years did the total Absenteeism Rate go below 24.06 %? Please list the years and corresponding total values.

NC.Q: Was the total Absenteeism Rate in 1992 higher or lower than in 1993?
NC.A: The total absenteeism rate in 1992 was {lower} than in 1993.

NC.Q: Between 1991 and 1993, was the average total Absenteeism Rate higher or lower than between 1992 and 1993?
NC.A: The average total absenteeism rate between 1991 and 1993 was {lower} than between 1992 and 1993.

NC.Q: Between 1992 and 1996, was the average total Absenteeism Rate higher or lower than between 1993 and 1995?
NC.A: The average total absenteeism rate between 1992 and 1996 was {higher} than between 1993 and 1995.

NC.Q: Between 1991 and 1992, was the average total Absenteeism Rate higher or lower than between 1992 and 1996?
NC.A: The average total absenteeism rate between 1991 and 1992 was {lower} than between 1992 and 1996.

MSR.Q: Which series has the largest cumulative area in this area chart?
MSR.A: {Engineering Department} has the largest cumulative area.

VA.Q: To reduce the 'waving' visual effect in the area chart, reorder the layers by end value and list the labels from top to bottom after sorting.
VA.A: The reordered layer order from top to bottom is: {Sales Team, Management Team, Human Resources, Research & Development, Administrative Support, Engineering Department}.
